name: -movie-project
description: Its a simple Movie  app that saves your favorite movies for easy reference. ## Setup/Installation Requirements     - Download zip in the code section of github to your desired folder     - Extract the files     - Open the folder with vs code.     - Then run "json-server --watch database.json" to run our server.     - The run your index.html by either using the "GO LIVE" extension or by double clicking of the index.html     - And your application is running.
